General.Name: Salfacorp
General.Description: SalfaCorp S.A. engages in engineering, construction, and real estate businesses in Chile, Peru, Colombia, the Caribbean, and Panama. The company offers construction and industrial assembly, civil works construction, industrial maintenance, mining development, marine works, earthmoving, and drilling and blasting services, as well as undertakes engineering, procurement, and construction projects. It is also involved in real estate, commercial, and infrastructure activities; and development and rental of commercial and industrial projects. The company was founded in 1929 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
General.Address: Avenida Presidente Riesco 5335, Santiago de Chile, Chile, 7561127
